name: Chip: The Last Forest Guardian
description:
Play as a little raccoon on a mission to revitalize his habitat with his homemade water-gun equipped robot suit! Explore, cleanse enemies with water, and solve puzzles to find the broken seeding drone pieces. Fix the drone and it will plant seeds to revitalize the once thriving environment!

Created by: Aline Lott Lara (programmer), Jayden Wilson (level designer & 3D artist), Anna Tkachenko (2D and 3D artist), Ash Reddick (VFX artist & narrative designer), Angelo Farias (project manager, narrative designer and 2D artist), and Alden McCallum (project manager, sound design, 2D and 3D artist)

Music created by: Elizabeth Kyriakides

This game is being developed for our 2023 Capstone Project in the Honours Bachelor of Game Design Program at Sheridan College, Oakville, Ontario, Canada.
